project_id.description: Unique identification code specific to individual funding application or contract. Project ID is supplied by [Department] upon approval of funding.

station_id.description: Unique identity specific to the physical location of the station (site) funded by the project. Station ID must be same as the permanent station identifier provided to third parties pursuant to CFR 23 ยง 680.116(c)(1).

org_name.description: Organization name of the obligated party.

org_state.description: Valid state code of obligated party.

org_zip.description:
Valid ZIP Code of entity responsible for operation 
and maintenance of the of the funded charging station.

poc_email.description: Obligated party point of contact valid email address

poc_first_name.description: Obligated party point of contact first name

poc_last_name.description: Obligated party point of contact last name

project_award_date.description: Date when project funding was awarded

primary_funding_source.description: Primary public funding source for the project/application

primary_funding.description:
Total funding (in USD) station received from the primary funding source dedicated
to station deployment. (should not include any funding for station operation costs)

utility_makeready.description:
Total funding (in USD) the project received from electric utilities
dedicated to infrastructure make-ready

utility_funding_other.description:
Total funding (in USD) the project received from utility for equipment
or other non-make-ready costs (should not include any funding for operational costs)

other_makeready.description: Total funding (in USD) other public funding received dedicated to infrastructure make-ready

other_funding_other.description:
Amount of other public funding project received for equipment
or other non-make-ready costs (should not include any funding for operational costs)

cost_share.description:
Funding amount project has received from other (private,
non-utility) sources when combined with primary_funding
and utility_funding and other_public_funding equals
the total cost of the charging installation

equipment_cost.description: Cost (in USD) to acquire funded charging equipment.

install_cost.description:
Cost (in USD) for all labor and materials costs (including electrical equipment)
necessary to necessary to install charging equipment.

property_cost.description: Cost (in USD) to acquire real property on which to install funded chargers.

der_equipment_cost.description: Cost (in USD) to acquire distributed energy resource equipment.

der_install_cost.description:
Cost (in USD) for all labor and materials costs (including electrical equipment)
necessary to install distributed energy resources equipment.

distribution_costs.description:
Cost (in USD) of contributions in aid of construction for line extensions
and upgrades necessary to install chargers.

service_costs.description:
Cost (in USD) of contributions in aid of construction for service upgrade
costs for customer transformers, poles, meters, and other utility service
equipment necessary to install chargers.

dac_type.description:
Method, model or program definition of disadvantaged community.
For example CEJST 1.0.

in_dac.description: Project is located inside of disadvantaged community as specified by dac_type.

dac_proximate.description:
Project is located within a program specified distance from disadvantaged community
as as specified by dac_type.

total_power.description:
The total charger power capacity (in kW) deployed by the project 
- if charging equipment share power supplies, only the maximum
simulataneous power output should be reported.
